# Posit Team User Training

::: {.subtitle}
Posit Team is the bundle of our most popular professional products including: Workbench, Connect, and Package Manager. Together, this bundle delivers an end-to-end toolchain for data science teams committed to R and Python, improving every step of a data scientist's workflow: from developing insights, to deploying data products, to managing environments.
